summary: A small plugin, which gives you an additional configurable Amount of Gold for every Main- and Normalquest, you complete. No incompabilities with other mods.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][u][size=4]
[size=5]Gold per Quest[/size][/size][/u][/b][/center]

[center]This is a single feature out of my bigger Mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72365/?]Skyrim Gold XP[/url], which I release here as a standalone Plugin.
[i]
This feature was done by lofgren for me as a request over at the Nexusforums, therefore he is the Author, but please do not bother him just because he already did something for someone. If you have a request, post it like everyone else at the Nexusforum. And also, don't bother me to change something in this mod, because I don't know how (else, I wouldn't had to ask someone to do it for me ^^).[/i]

[size=3]It will give you a configurable Amount of Gold for every Main- and Normalquest, you complete. It does not differ between normal Quests and Mainquests and will not award Misc-Quests, which are listet under Various in your Questjournal (for example Bountyquests etc.)

The Amount can be changed ingame by Consolecommand: Open the console and type
[/size][size=3][size=2][size=3]"set ax_GoldperQuest to X" (without " ")
where X is your desired amount.[/size]
[size=3]Standardly it is set to 2000 Gold.[/size]
[u]
[size=3]This Mod needs [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url][/size][/u]

This Mod is Compatible with everything, because it edits nothing in the game, it just adds some new records. Mod-added Quests will also work.

Install with NMM, MO, similar or just drop the files in your Skyrim/data/-Folder.
When uninstalling on a save, you still want to play, you may want to use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/?]Save Game Script Cleaner by Hadoram[/url] afterwards.
[b][u][size=4][/size][/u][/b][/size][/size][/center][size=3][size=2][b][u][size=4]
[/size][/u][/b][/size][/size][center][b][u][size=4]Other Mods by me[/size][/u][/b]

[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70862/?]Simple Stagger on Regular hit (scriptfree)
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70465/?]Heal over Time (converts Healingspells in Skyrim from instant to HoTs)
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59447/?]Simple Stamina Managment
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72365/?]Skyrim Gold XP[/url][/b][b]
[/b][/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72365/?]
[/url]
author: lofgren
